WRITING.TEXT: I started rewatching TWD, these past few days, and thought I should paint Rick. I could use the practice; it was challenging, but fun!

WRITING.TITLE: I digitally painted Rick, as a study!

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you! I appreciate you for reaching out!
Wow! Thank you! That's very useful! I really appreciate it, because my back has been killing me :O
I apologize for the sob story. I'm just not sure where to turn to, anymore.
